text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-eplerenone
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/pddi/ValueSet/valueset-spironolactone

name: Valueset_AAS
title: Aldosterone Antagonists Drug Value Set
description: ValueSet of ValueSets containing drug identifiers for each member in the     Established Pharmacologic Class (EPC) Aldosterone Antagonist drug class (id: N0000175557).     Member by RxNorm: getRelatedByType (BN,BPCK,GPCK,IN,MIN,PIN,SBD,SBDC,SBDF,SBDG,SCD,SCDC,SCDF,SCDG)
purpose: Provide Aldosterone Antagonist drug class terminology for PDDI CDS FHIR resources
